item.title: G8 1800 DD Designe3D v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 18, 2025

G8 1800 DD Designe3D v1.0 ETS2

Our Mods can work on multiple versions of Euro Truck Simulator 2, but our commitment is to keep all truck and trailer Mods compatible with the most recent version of Euro Truck Simulator 2.
We may add new parts and accessories in future updates, but I want to make it clear that Grupo Design 3D is not obligated to add new parts and accessories periodically.

Credits: desing 3d

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania 111 Jacare RC v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 18, 2025

Scania 111 Jacare RC v1.0 ETS2

The Scania 111 “Jacaré” is a legendary truck in Brazil, known for its distinctive design and robust performance. The “Jacaré” (Portuguese for “alligator”) nickname comes from the truck’s front end, which some say resembles the head of an alligator.

History and Characteristics
The Scania 111S (often simply called 111) was first produced in 1975, with sales in Brazil starting in 1976 as the successor to the L110 line. It quickly became a favorite on Brazilian roads and was sold for six years until 1981, when it was replaced by the T 112. Despite being out of production for decades, many Scania 111s are still in operation today, a testament to their durability.
One notable feature of the Scania 111S upon its introduction was its characteristic orange color, which helped make it easily recognizable on the roads.
Under the hood, the original Scania 111S featured a powerful DS 11 engine. This was an 11.02-liter, 6-cylinder in-line engine, capable of producing 296 horsepower at 2,200 rpm and a maximum torque of 111 mkgf at 1400 rpm. It was typically equipped with a 10-speed gearbox. Despite its power, the Scania 111S was also considered fuel-efficient for its time, with a consumption rate of around 1.98 km/l, even on varied terrain.

Models and Features
The Scania 111 came in various versions, including L, LS, and LT, all featuring the distinctive “Jacaré” front-engine design. These trucks often had options for a sleeper cabin or a simple day cab.

Key features and specifications include:
Engine: DS 11 (11.02 liters, 6-cylinder in-line)
Power: 296 hp (turbocharged version)
Torque: 111 mkgf
Gearbox: Typically 10 speeds
Fuel Economy: Around 1.98 km/l (tested)
Electrical System: 24V, with two 12V batteries in series.

Restoration and Market Value
Given its status as a classic truck, the Scania 111 Jacaré is a popular choice for restoration projects in Brazil. Many enthusiasts and owners invest in bringing these iconic vehicles back to their original glory, or even customizing them with modern comforts like air conditioning and upgraded interiors.
As for market value, prices for a used Scania 111 Jacaré can vary significantly based on its condition, year, and whether it has been restored or modified. You can find options ranging from around R$ 25,000 to R$ 75,000 or more for models in good condition or undergoing restoration. Parts are still available, though some specialized components may be harder to find or more expensive.

The Scania 111 Jacaré remains a beloved and respected truck, embodying a significant chapter in the history of heavy transport in Brazil.
Do you have any specific questions about a particular aspect of the Scania 111 Jacaré, such as its performance, common issues, or where to find parts?

Credits: romario cardoso

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. item.title: Trfego De nibus g7 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 18, 2025

Trfego De nibus g7 v1.0 ETS2

To experience “G7 Bus Traffic” in Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), you’ll need specific traffic mods that add Brazilian buses, including Marcopolo G7 models, to the game’s AI-controlled vehicle traffic.

What are these mods?
These mods replace or add vehicles to ETS2’s standard traffic, allowing you to see buses like the Marcopolo Paradiso G7 1200, 1600 LD, and 1800 DD (Double Decker) driving on the roads, often with liveries (skins) of real Brazilian bus companies. This increases immersion, especially if you’re using Brazilian maps in the game.
How they work and where to find them:
1. Traffic Mods: Traffic mods are file packages that contain the 3D models of the buses and the settings for them to appear in the game. Some of the best-known are the “Brazilian Traffic Pack” (like Jazzycat’s, which is frequently updated) or bus-specific traffic packs.

Installation:
Typically, you download a file in `.scs` format.
This file should be copied to the “mod” folder within the Euro Truck Simulator 2 directory (usually in `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod`).
Within the game, in the “Mod Manager” (when loading your profile), you need to activate the traffic mod, ensuring that it has an appropriate priority (often above other traffic mods or maps, if there are specific instructions from the mod creator).
3. Compatibility: It is crucial to check the mod’s compatibility with the current version of your Euro Truck Simulator 2. Outdated mods can cause crashes or errors in the game.

Important notes:
Brazilian maps: Although traffic mods work on any map, they are especially recommended for use with Brazilian maps (such as EAA, Rotas Brasil, etc.) for a more authentic experience.
Performance: Adding too many traffic mods can impact your game’s performance, depending on your computer’s specifications.

Credits: the gold game

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: COMIL INVICTUS DD 8×2 VOLVO v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 18, 2025

COMIL INVICTUS DD 8×2 VOLVO v1.0 ETS2

O Comil Invictus DD 8×2 Volvo is a highly regarded double-decker bus, especially for tourism and long-distance routes, combining the modern Comil body with the robustness and technology of Volvo chassis. Here are the main features and information about this model:

Features and Specifications
Configuration: It is a four-axle bus (8×2), which provides greater load capacity, stability and comfort on long journeys.
Comil Invictus DD body:
Design: It has a modern and imposing design, with aerodynamic lines and high-quality finishes. The latest versions (from 2023) bring new development pillars focused on dynamism, harmony and differentiation, including rear-view mirrors with two mirrors for better visibility and an altered inclination of the upper glass.

Interior: Offers ample interior and luggage space. It can be configured for different classes of service, including bed and semi-bed seats, with options of up to 82 seats, depending on the configuration. The interior is designed for comfort and ergonomics, with high-quality materials, LED lighting (including chromotherapy options), USB sockets in each seat and a new overhead panel with touchscreen for the driver.
Safety: The structure of the Invictus DD meets the requirements of the ECE R66 standard, ensuring greater safety for passengers and the driver. Newer models can include ADAS (Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems) systems, such as a camera for lane reading and reading the vehicle ahead. Volvo chassis: Comil builds the Invictus DD on a variety of chassis, with Volvo being a popular option.

The most common Volvo chassis for this configuration include:
Volvo B450R: A powerful chassis, often used in DD buses, known for its performance and technology.
Volvo B420R: Another robust option, also common in double-decker buses.
Volvo B510R (D13K Euro 6): Newer models can come equipped with this 510hp engine, which offers high power and a 510hp VEB+ braking system, and can reach 1,100hp with the retarder.
Transmission: Usually equipped with Volvo’s 12-speed I-Shift automated transmission, which provides smooth and efficient shifting.
Brakes: Disc brake system with ABS and EBS, plus engine brake.

Volvo B510R (D13K Euro 6): Newer models can come equipped with this 510hp engine, which offers high power and a 510hp VEB+ braking system, and can reach 1,100hp with the retarder.
Transmission: Usually equipped with Volvo’s 12-speed I-Shift automated transmission, which provides smooth and efficient shifting.
Brakes: Disc brake system with ABS and EBS, plus engine brake (VEB or VEB+) and optional retarder for greater safety on descents.

Price (Reference values, may vary)
Prices for the Comil Invictus DD 8×2 Volvo vary significantly depending on the year of manufacture, mileage, state of repair and level of customization/accessories.
Used models (2015-2022): They can be found in the range of R$950,000.00 to R$1,680,000.00. For example, a 2018 model can cost around R$1,120,000.00, while a 2021/2022 can reach R$1,680,000.00.
0 km models (2023/2024): The price of a new Comil Invictus DD 8×2 Volvo could be around R$1,560,000.00 (consortium price as a reference).

Market and Popularity
The Comil Invictus DD 8×2 Volvo is a very popular model in the Brazilian bus market, and is a frequent choice for tourism and passenger transportation companies looking for comfort, safety and high capacity. The combination of Comil bodywork and Volvo chassis is prized for its reliability and performance.
If you have any more questions about this bus or want to know any specific details, just ask!

Credits: romario cardoso

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

item.title: Honda Accord 2021 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 18, 2025

Honda Accord 2021 v1.0 ETS2

The 2021 Honda Accord is a highly regarded mid-size sedan known for its blend of performance, fuel efficiency, spacious interior, and standard safety features. It continued to be a class leader in its segment.

Key Features and Specifications
Engines: The 2021 Accord offered two main engine options:
A 1.5-liter turbocharged 4-cylinder engine producing 192 horsepower and 192 lb-ft of torque, paired with a continuously variable transmission (CVT).
A 2.0-liter turbocharged 4-cylinder engine generating 252 horsepower and 273 lb-ft of torque, mated to a 10-speed automatic transmission.
A hybrid model was also available, combining a 2.0-liter Atkinson-cycle engine with two electric motors for a total of 212 horsepower and 232 lb-ft of torque.
Fuel Economy: Both gasoline engines offered strong fuel economy ratings. The hybrid model was particularly efficient, with an EPA rating of 44 mpg city and 41 mpg highway for the Touring Hybrid.
Interior: The Accord boasts a cavernous and comfortable interior with upscale materials, especially in higher trims. It offers ample legroom, particularly in the rear seats, making it suitable for families. Trunk space is also generous.
Handling and Ride: The 2021 Accord is praised for its sporty handling that makes it enjoyable to drive, while maintaining a firm yet comfortable ride.
Technology: Standard features included an 8-inch touchscreen infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration. Higher trims offered wireless Apple CarPlay/Android Auto, a premium audio system, and a wireless phone charger.
Safety Features: Honda Sensing, a suite of advanced driver-assistance systems, came standard across all trims. This included features like:
Collision Mitigation Braking System (CMBS)
Road Departure Mitigation System (RDM)
Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC)
Lane Keeping Assist System (LKAS)
Traffic Sign Recognition System (TSR)

Common Problems and Reliability
While generally considered reliable, some common issues reported for the 2021 Honda Accord include:
Automatic Emergency Braking System (AEB): This is the most frequently cited complaint, with reports of “phantom braking” or abrupt activation.
Brake Problems: Some owners have reported high-pitched noises from the rear brakes, particularly when backing up.
Electrical Issues: There have been isolated complaints about various electrical issues, such as dashboard warning lights illuminating, infotainment connectivity problems (Apple CarPlay/Bluetooth), and in rare cases, systems like the AC or wipers failing.
Oil Leaks: While not widespread, some owners have reported oil leaks from the oil pressure switch/sensor at relatively low mileage.

Reliability Ratings:
The 2021 Honda Accord generally receives strong reliability ratings. RepairPal gives it a 4.5 out of 5.0 reliability rating, ranking it 1st out of 24 midsize cars. The average annual repair cost is estimated at around $400, which is lower than the average for the midsize car segment.

Overall, the 2021 Honda Accord remains a highly recommended choice for those seeking a well-rounded, practical, and enjoyable mid-size sedan. Its combination of performance, interior space, and safety features makes it a strong contender in its class.

Credits: gasp
